text: Società Polisportiva Ars et Labor, commonly known as S.P.A.L. (), is a professional football club from Ferrara, Emilia-Romagna, Italy. The club was founded in 1907 and plays in Serie B, the second tier of Italian football. They have played their home matches at Stadio Paolo Mazza since 1928. == Name changes == * 1907–2005: SPAL * 2005–2012: SPAL 1907 * 2012–2013: SSD Real SPAL * 2013–2018: SPAL 2013 * 2018–Present: SPAL ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Out on loan=== ==Honours== ===Domestic=== ====League titles==== * Serie B ** Winners (2): 1950–51, 2016–17 * Serie C ** Winners (3): 1937–38, 1972–73, 1977–78 ** Runners-up (4): 1941–42, 1942–43, 1969–70, 1970–71 * Lega Pro ** Winners (1): 2015–16 * Serie C1 ** Winners (1): 1991–92 ** Runners-up (1): 1995–96 * Serie C2 ** Winners (1): 1997–98 ** Runners-up (1): 1990–91 ====Cups==== * Coppa Italia ** Runners-up (1): 1961–62 * Coppa Italia Serie C ** Winners (1): 1998–99 ** Runners-up (1): 1988–89 * Supercoppa di Lega Pro ** Winners (1): 2016 ===European=== * Cup of Italian-Swiss Friendship ** Winners (1): 1968 ==References== Category:1907 establishments in Italy Category:Ferrara Category:Italian football clubs
title: S.P.A.L.
